article_text:
How do you think the charges will affect Cosby’s legacy?

og.description: As the Confederate flag sank over South Carolina, Donald Trump rose over North Carolina like a Mickey Mouse balloon over the Macy’s Thanksgiving parade. Trump’s charge that Mexican “rapists” bring drugs and crime into the United States seemed to swell our extremists. “Trump’s really caught fire with voters on the far right,” reports Public Policy Polling.
